mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rating (user_id, book_id, rating, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{rating}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.user_id, r.book_id, r.rating, r.created_at, r.updated_at, u.username, b.name AS book_name FROM rating r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN book b ON r.book_id = b.id ORDER BY r.created_at ASC
